BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ppwwyyxx/tensorpack/blob/7a5b861ab5ff9d018f4700e95bf0985d55c1841c/tensorpack/callbacks/inference_runner.py#L80>https://github.com/ppwwyyxx/tensorpack/blob/7a5b861ab5ff9d018f4700e95bf0985d55c1841c/tensorpack/callbacks/inference_runner.py#L80</denchmark-link>
 
 Should this line be self._size = np.inf ?
 When self._size is set as 0, there will be no output in self.stats in ScarStates,
 and if it is set as inf, tf.errors.OutOfRange will be raised before the end of dataflow.

comments_0.comment_text: Thanks for pointing out! Could you try again?

comments_1.comment_text: It worked as expected after pulling the newest code  ：）
